r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d:
Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.2.4+ and PHP 5.1.3+.
IMPORTANT: Version 2.x API is not compatible with earlier versions.
r.n: - Added Countable interface to Imagick class - Added experimental support for Zend MM. If compiled with --enable-imagick-zend-mm Imagick will respect PHP memory limits - Added additional parameter to writeImageFile to allow setting format - Distribute tests as part of the release - Fixed Bug #65043: Destroy and clear method do the same things - Fixed Bug #64945: ZEND_ACC_ALLOW_STATIC vs ZEND_ACC_STATIC - A lot of internal refactoring: rewrite macros as functions, clean up naming etc
